about_the_game:
Shell Smite the Faithless is a 3rd Person Roguelite Shooter supporting 1~4 players where you take on the role of a Norse warrior. In a chaotic world where runes, magic, and shotguns coexist, evolve with the blessings of the gods, annihilate heretical enemies and their leaders, and rebuild a macho world!

SHOTGUNS AND MYTH COLLIDE: AN EPIC BATTLE ACROSS THE NINE REALMS

Become a Viking warrior who worships strength and devastating firepower. With divine blessings, fight the endless wave of enemies, and restore the broken dimensional gates with your allies to save the Nine Realms from the chaos caused by WHINER (Whispering Humans In Need of Everything).

UNPARALLELED SHOTGUN IMPACT

  • Feel the thrill of diverse shotguns the moment you wield them.

  • Combine runes and magic for customization options to create 'shotguns beyond shotguns.'

BLESSING OF THE GODS

  • Master the battlefield with the blessings of Odin, Tyr, Thor, and Freyja.

  • Each god's blessing grants you unique skills and the power to turn the tide of battle. 

  • Forge your combat style with the gods' might.

  • Uncover hidden gears (O-parts) in dungeons to upgrade your shotgun and equipment. 

EVER-CHANGING DUNGEONS

  • No two dungeons are ever the same, offering action-packed battles and fresh combat experiences every time.

  • Explore the Nine Realms to uncover hidden equipment and unravel untold stories. 

4-PLAYER CO-OP: FRIEND OR FOE?

  • Team up with friends to defeat waves of enemies and experience dynamic moments driven by teamwork. 

  • But beware — is the friend behind you truly an ally or the source of chaos? 

  • Unpredictable situations heighten the tension of every battle! 

APPEARANCE CUSTOMIZATION

  • Customize your armor, helmet, and cloak to become the coolest warrior on the battlefield. 

ADD TO YOUR WISHILIST NOW!

Are you ready to dive into a chaotic world where legendary shotguns and Norse mythology collide? The warrior's journey to bless the heretics of the Nine Realms is about to begin!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
